headline.main: Dallas Shootings Were ‘Vicious’ and ‘Despicable,’ Obama Says

snippet: The president cautioned that a lot about the attack was still not known, but said there was “no possible justification” for such violence against law enforcement officers....
lead_paragraph: The president cautioned that a lot about the attack was still not known, but said there was “no possible justification” for such violence against law enforcement officers.
